channel.title: Special Attack!
channel.description:
Alright, i didnt know what i should put in the title.
I want to add a special attack to primal rapier / other weapons. Like the Player is using Forcechat than and shouting like "RAAARGH!" And then he has Super strength and is hitting fast like the Saradomin sword.
Could be amazing when someone links me to a simple snippet
